select lsnfee.lsn_fee_id ,lsnfee.stu_id ,lsnfee.stu_name ,lsnfee.subject_id ,lesson.subject_sub_id ,lsnfee.subject_name ,lesson.subject_sub_name ,lesson.lesson_type ,lsnfee.pay_style ,lsnfee.lsn_month ,lsnfee.own_flg ,sum(lsnfee.lsn_count) as lsn_count ,CASE WHEN SUM(lsnfee.lsn_count) > 4
THEN subject_price * 4
ELSE SUM(lsnfee.lsn_fee) END AS lsn_fee from ( v_info_lesson_fee_connect_lsn lsnfee inner join v_info_lesson_include_extra2sche lesson on lsnfee.lesson_id = lesson.lesson_id
and lsnfee.own_flg = 0 )
substring(lsnfee.lsn_month,1,4) = #{year}
group by lsnfee.lsn_fee_id ,lsnfee.stu_id ,lsnfee.stu_name ,lsnfee.subject_id ,lesson.subject_sub_id ,lsnfee.subject_name ,lesson.subject_sub_name ,lesson.lesson_type ,lsnfee.pay_style ,lsnfee.lsn_month ,lsnfee.subject_price order by stu_name,lsn_month desc, subject_id, subject_sub_id desc

select lsnfee.lsn_fee_id ,lsnfee.stu_id ,lsnfee.stu_name ,lsnfee.subject_id ,lsnfee.subject_name ,lesson.subject_sub_name ,lesson.lesson_type ,lsnfee.pay_style ,lsnfee.lsn_month
,lsnfee.subject_price ,sum(lsnfee.lsn_count) as lsn_count ,CASE WHEN SUM(lsnfee.lsn_count) > 4 THEN lsnfee.subject_price * 4 ELSE SUM(lsnfee.lsn_fee) END AS lsn_fee from ( v_info_lesson_fee_connect_lsn lsnfee inner join v_info_lesson_include_extra2sche lesson on lsnfee.lesson_id = lesson.lesson_id
and lsnfee.own_flg = 0 ) where lsn_fee_id = #{lsnFeeId} group by lsnfee.lsn_fee_id ,lsnfee.stu_id ,lsnfee.stu_name ,lsnfee.subject_id ,lsnfee.subject_name ,lesson.subject_sub_name ,lesson.lesson_type ,lsnfee.pay_style ,lsnfee.lsn_month ,lsnfee.subject_price order by stu_name,lsn_month
